The Tteokguk was made by boiling Tteok (Korean rice cakes) in Shiitake mushrooms & beef Galbi soup and topping 
it with spring onions and thin strips of fried egg white & yolk. This is the first time I make Tteokguk and I 
never knew it's so appetising. Since it does not require much effort I might routinely enjoy it from now on.
